description: This Java source file defines the RecipeService class, which provides various methods for managing recipes such as listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting recipes within the application. It interacts with repositories and models related to recipes and categories, and handles exceptions for resource not found cases.

classes.name: RecipeService
classes.description: Service class providing CRUD and query operations for Recipe entities, interacting with repositories and handling exceptions.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieve a paginated list of recipes filtered by optional query string and category ID.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieve a single recipe by its ID, returning an Optional.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Create a new recipe using provided data transfer object, associating it with a category.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update an existing recipe identified by ID with new data, including category association.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete a recipe by its ID, throwing an exception if not found.
